text: Mjölby Södra IF is a Swedish football club located in Mjölby. ==Background== Mjölby Södra IF currently plays in Division 4 Östergötland Västra which is the sixth tier of Swedish football. They play their home matches at the Lundbyvallen in Mjölby. The club are affiliated to Östergötlands Fotbollförbund. Mjölby Södra IF played in the 2007 Svenska Cupen but lost 0–4 at home to Rynninge IK in the first round. ==Season to season== In their most successful period Mjölby Södra IF competed in the following
